title: The Humbug Murders [Ebenezer Scrooge Mystery, #01] - L.J. Oliver
description:
Ebenezer Scrooge from Charles Dickensâ€™s A Christmas Carol investigates a shocking murder - before he becomes the next victim - in this playful mystery in a new series from a New York Times bestselling author.

Scrooge considers himself a rational man with a keen sense of deductive reasoning developed from years of business dealings. But that changes one night when heâ€™s visited by the ghost of his former boss and friend, Fezziwig, who mysteriously warns him that three more will die, and ultimately Ebenezer himselfâ€”if he doesnâ€™t get to the bottom of a vast conspiracy.

When he wakes the next day, Scrooge discovers that not only is Fezziwig dead, but heâ€™s under arrest as all evidence points toward himself: Scroogeâ€™s calling card was found in the cold, dead hand of Fezziwigâ€™s body, and someone scribbled â€œHUMBUGâ€ in blood on the floor nearby.

Now, Scrooge must race against the pocket watch to clear his name, protect his interests, and find out who killed his last true friend - before the â€œHumbug Killerâ€ strikes again
